nodes.text: The Sith Lord Vodal Kressh gathered an army of followers in order to use against the reconstituted Sith Empire led by Vitiate, though he died before putting any of his plans into action. His followers remained on the planet Athiss over the following centuries, however. Their ranks included warriors, hunters, and shaman.
By the time of the Battle of Yavin thousands of years later, it was rumored that the Republic had destroyed Kressh and his followers, but that a dark cult still protected his tomb.
